Package view.graphicInterfaces

Interface PlayerInfoGraphics

All Known Subinterfaces:
GameGraphics
All Known Implementing Classes:
GamePanel, TUI
public interface PlayerInfoGraphics
This interface represents the graphics for a common goal completed and an error reported. It provides two methods to update the information of the player's info during the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

    void

    This method updates the information of an error reported during the match with the specified parameter:
